435510.name: Influent DLC - Dansk [Learn Danish Language]
435510.description:
This Language Pack is for those who wish to learn Danish with Influent.

INFLUENT LANGUAGE PACK DLC

This DLC adds a new target language to Influent, a 3D language learning game focused on vocabulary acquisition through exploration and interaction.

Each Influent language pack includes hundreds of everyday words voiced by native speakers. Players learn by exploring a fully interactive 3D apartment, clicking on familiar objects, and hearing their names pronounced naturally in the selected language. This contextual approach helps learners associate words with real world objects, making vocabulary easier to remember and more intuitive to use.

Unlike traditional language learning tools, Influent does not rely on drills, flashcards, or rigid lesson structures. Players are free to explore, repeat audio as often as they like, and learn at their own pace without time limits or pressure. This makes Influent ideal for beginners, casual learners, students, travelers, and polyglots alike.

Each language pack integrates seamlessly into the base game and can be switched at any time. Players who own multiple language packs can move between languages freely, compare vocabulary across languages, or study more than one language at once.

Language Pack Features

Hundreds of practical, everyday vocabulary words

Native speaker audio pronunciation for all words

Nouns, adjectives, and verbs included

Fully integrated with Influent’s interactive 3D environment

Learn at your own pace with no time limits or forced progression

Designed for real world vocabulary retention

About Influent

Influent is a language learning game on Steam that teaches foreign language vocabulary through immersion, exploration, and interaction. By placing learners inside a realistic 3D environment and allowing them to discover language naturally, Influent offers a more intuitive alternative to traditional study methods.

If you are looking for a language learning game, a vocabulary learning tool with native audio, or an educational game that supports multiple languages, Influent language packs expand the experience and allow you to learn more languages using the same immersive approach.

No AI Content

This DLC was created entirely without the use of artificial intelligence. All audio is recorded by native speakers, and all content is developed by humans.

Credits

Translation: Jonas Henriksen

Pronunciation: John ‘nox’ Hand
